meanings.definition: A type of Colombian music and dance.
meanings.sent1: We danced to lively cumbias at the festival.
meanings.sent2: The band played traditional cumbias all night long.
meanings.sent3: The cumbias made everyone at the party want to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her joy was like the vibrant cumbias filling the air.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic beats of the cumbias echoed through the streets.

meanings.definition: Plural form of cumbia, a genre of music and dance originating from Colombia.
meanings.sent1: The radio station played classic cumbias from the 80s.
meanings.sent2: In Colombia, people often gather to dance to cumbias.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with the sound of joyful cumbias.
meanings.sent4: The cumbias floated in the air like colorful butterflies.
meanings.sent5: His favorite part of the concert was when they played cumbias.
